info.name: Languages
info.description: Languages from Obojima: Tales from the Tall Grass

element.name: Archaic First Age Languages
element.source: Obojima: Tales from the Tall Grass

description.p: The objects and structures from the island's earliest age contain a variety of written languages known to the islanders as First Age languages. Other than the academics who devote themselves to studying these mysterious languages, people generally know only a handful of words.

element.name: Naku Naku
element.source: Obojima: Tales from the Tall Grass

description.p: Most Nakudama continue to speak their original language as well as the common tongue, and they claim theirs is far richer for the telling of tales.

element.name: Torum
element.source: Obojima: Tales from the Tall Grass

description.p: Torum is the favored language of the Spirit Realm. Though non-spirits can learn to understand it, beings of the Physical Realm often can't make the layered sounds required to voice the words.
